name: Safety Coach Agent
tagline: Proactive safety guidance and incident learning at scale
overview: The Safety Coach Agent provides proactive safety guidance and helps the organization learn from incidents and near-misses. It delivers just-in-time safety reminders, analyzes incident patterns, surfaces relevant lessons learned, and supports safety professionals with data-driven insights.
whatItDoes: Delivers context-aware safety reminders and tips
Surfaces lessons learned from past incidents
Supports safety investigations with similar case data
Generates safety trend reports for leadership
prompts: What are the key safety risks for this operation?
Show me incidents similar to this near-miss
What safety trends should I discuss in this week's toolbox talk?
What PPE is required for this task?
Generate a safety summary for the monthly review
guardrails: Does not replace required safety training or procedures
Incident investigation led by qualified safety professionals
No punitive use of AI-derived insights against individuals
Emergency situations always escalate to immediate human response
All safety recommendations based on approved procedures
